RESET_PASSWORD_NOTI.TITLE: YOUR PASSWORD HAS BEEN RESET
RESET_PASSWORD_NOTI.CONTENT: Your IRIS SAFER Password has been successfully reset. Please click on the button below to login to IRIS SAFER using your new password.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.CONTENT: Instructions for resetting your IRIS SAFER password have been sent to your email address.

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: RESET PASSWORD
RESET_PASSWORD.GUIDE: Please enter your email address in the box below. Instructions for resetting your IRIS SAFER password will be sent to you shortly.

ONBOARDING.TITLE: WELCOME TO IRIS SAFER
ONBOARDING.INSTRUCTION_PRA: To continue, please select and confirm your password. Using the IRIS SAFER Pilot is subject to Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully and confirm by checking the box. Then complete registration by clicking the button below.
ONBOARDING.NAME: NAME

COMPLETE_REGISTRATION.TITLE: IRIS SAFER Registration Complete
COMPLETE_REGISTRATION.CONTENT: You have completed IRIS SAFER Registration. Please use your email address and your chosen password to login
